name: Top Accounts & Deals Review- MEDDIC/Sales
description:
This template allows you to review/manage/strategize/brainstorm top deals or accounts and can be used by sales and account management teams.


The template outlines the MEDDIC sales qualification process and allows reps to customize out details about the account, past and future calls and meetings, notes about the account, as well as a company hierarchy chart to track who they are working with at this account
